source_objects.title: Communication
source_objects.description: Communicate better with these powerful courses in written and verbal communications.

items.title: Report Writing Made Simple

visible_instructors.job_title: Cambridge University writing tutor & professional copywriter
visible_instructors.name: Clare
visible_instructors.title: Clare Lynch

items.headline: Writing a report step by step. Planning to proofing - for a polished, professional, persuasive business report.
objectives_summary: Save time when planning a report by knowing the essential questions to ask
Increase the impact of a report by understanding its purpose
Structure complex information and ideas confidently and  quickly (under five minutes)

items.title: Public Speaking and Presenting at Work

visible_instructors.job_title: International Academy of Life Coaching & Entrepreneurship
visible_instructors.name: Transformation
visible_instructors.title: Transformation Services

items.headline: Master professional presentation skills, develop confidence, command the room, facilitate meetings & design your speech.
objectives_summary: Overcome nervousness and anxiety about speaking
Project competence and confidence and command the room
Use notes, cues and memory techniques so you’ll feel confident that you wont’ forget what to say.

items.title: Business Presentation Skills - Excellence Made Easy

visible_instructors.job_title: People Development Professional: Business & Personal Growth
visible_instructors.name: Richard
visible_instructors.title: Richard Lock

items.headline: Become a confident presenter. Learn how to give clear, confident & effective business presentations every time.
objectives_summary: Deliver powerful, high impact business presentations that audiences remember and act on.
Connect emotionally with your audience in a way that successfully persuades, influences and informs.
Look, sound and feel confident - as if you have been presenting for years

items.title: Working from Home Effectively
items.headline: Work from home - being productive & efficient. Working from home self-employed, virtual teams, freelance or remote work.
objectives_summary: A step by step practical guide to working effectively from home
Create a work environment which suits you
Overcoming stress and procrastination

items.title: How To Quickly Diffuse Another Person's Anger
items.headline: Learn the powerful and effective Five Step Process to effectively de-escalate an angry confrontation
objectives_summary: Master skills to calm an angry person down
Learn to identify the root cause of a person's anger
Develop the skills to work toward an amicable resolution

items.title: How To Make A Great First Impression

visible_instructors.job_title: Researcher, Speaker hall of fame, BBC radio host, & Author.
visible_instructors.name: David
visible_instructors.title: David Hyner

items.headline: A beginners guide to using eye contact, your smile, a handshake and your words to make a GREAT first impression.
objectives_summary: appear and act more confidently in public and at meetings
look people in the eye
smile and be comfortable holding eye contact

items.title: Communication Skills for Beginners
items.headline: Start Building Your Communication Skills Now
objectives_summary: Communicate effectively to individuals and small groups
Deliver presentations
Display basic public speaking skills

items.title: Public Speaking and Presentations Pro: No Beginners Allowed!

visible_instructors.job_title: Author, YouTuber, Keynote & TEDx Speaker, CEO Rule the Room
visible_instructors.name: Jason
visible_instructors.title: Jason Teteak

items.headline: Learn the public speaking secrets to giving a master presentation, techniques most speakers have never even heard of.
objectives_summary: How to instantly captivate your audience and keep them engaged so they can’t wait to hear what you have to say next
How to quickly identify the goals of your audience without them knowing you did it
The secret to answering questions so you always look like you know the answer even when you don’t

items.title: The Complete Storytelling Course for Speaking & Presenting
items.headline: Your Storytelling Abilities Will Make Your Presentations and Speeches Memorable and Engaging!
objectives_summary: You will become an excellent storyteller in your presentations
Have confidence in your ability to captivate any audience
Speak in a memorable manner

items.title: Master Business Writing and Editing
items.headline: Patterns and strategies to help you write and edit your emails, letters, and memos so they stand out among peers
objectives_summary: Write effective business emails, memos, and letters
Edit messages to make them clear and concise
Impress colleagues and/or professors with your writing

items.title: Account Management for Beginners

visible_instructors.job_title: International Content Strategy, Udemy for Business
visible_instructors.name: Erin
visible_instructors.title: Erin Adams Chanler

items.headline: Practice Partner Relationship Management and Communication Strategies with Real World Scenarios
objectives_summary: Confidently manage partner-facing communications
Build and grow strategic partnerships for your business
Choose effective language to use in difficult conversations

items.title: Learn about Content Writing
items.headline: A complete guide for all things about content writing
objectives_summary: Learn how to prepare quality, SEO and SMO friendly content

items.title: Presentation Skills: Give More Powerful, Memorable Talks
items.headline: Improve your public speaking skills by using proven branding techniques to make your presentations truly shine
objectives_summary: Develop more focused presentations
Design slides that create more impact
Prepare the right way so you can speak with confidence

items.title: Advanced agile communication skills for 21st Century leaders
items.headline: Upgrade your skills for Industry 4.0 by discovering how to lead using information, communication & control (agile)
objectives_summary: Build agile teams that can rapidly respond to change.
Improve awareness; think more clearly and communicate more concisely
Make better decisions faster

items.title: Write a Bestselling Novel in 15 Steps (Writing Mastery)

visible_instructors.job_title: International Bestselling Author and Writing Teacher
visible_instructors.name: Jessica
visible_instructors.title: Jessica Brody

items.headline: Discover the secret storytelling code behind all successful novels and use it to outline, write, or revise your own
objectives_summary: Plot an entire novel from start to finish (in 15 steps)
Understand what makes novels successful
Craft a compelling "novel road map" or outline for a new novel

items.title: The Art of Communications - Become A Master Communicator

visible_instructors.job_title: Medical Doctor, Coach, Award Winning Instructor
visible_instructors.name: Dr. Roy
visible_instructors.title: Dr. Roy Naraine

items.headline: Communication skills training. Confidence. Public Speaking. Promotion. Body Language. Pay raise. Job interview. Speech.
objectives_summary: This course will allow you to massively improve your communications skills.
The ultimate goal is to become a master communicator.
